description: Transport Canada has a requirement for the purchase, delivery and storage of office rotary chairs. Further to Article 800 of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), CFTA does not apply to this procurement.

full_summary:
================================

# Tender Notice - Office Rotary Chairs
## Reference: T8080-230366

### Solicitation Information

* Solicitation Number: T8080-230366
* Amendment Number: 7
* Publication Date: November 15, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 28, 2023, at 3:00 PM EST
* Amendment Date: November 21, 2023


### Tender Details

* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* UNSPSC Codes:
	+ 56101504: Chairs
	+ 56101700: Office Furniture
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Selection Criteria: Not Applicable
* Trade Agreements: Not Applicable


### Contracting Information

* Contracting Entity: Transport Canada
* Contracting Entity Address:
	+ 344 Edmonton St, Winnipeg, Manitoba R3B 2L4
* Contact Information:
	+ Cory Lajoie, cory.lajoie@tc.gc.ca, 204-228-2267


### Additional Documents

* Tender Notice: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24918/t8080-230366---npp.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24918/t8080-230366---rfp.pdf)
* Request for Proposal (RFP): [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24918/t8080-230366---ias.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/24918/t8080-230366---ias.pdf)


### Important Information

* This procurement is set aside under the federal government's Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business. For more information, refer to Annex 9.4 of the Supply Manual.
* This procurement is exempt from international trade agreements under the provision of each agreement respecting Aboriginal peoples or small and minority businesses.

### Status
This tender has been cancelled. Please check with the contracting agency for further information.
